definition: low/beneath/to lower (one's head)/to let droop/to hang down/to incline

sentences.english: Every office has its share of favoritism, inefficiency and dumb decisions.
sentences.chinese: 每一个办公室都有偏袒，低效，错误决定的现象。

sentences.english: The small electrical antenna is characteristic of a low input impedance and a low efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 传统的电小天线其特点是低输入电阻和低效率。

sentences.english: This is not just a plan to reduce the cost and inefficiency of departmental ICT.
sentences.chinese: 这不仅仅是降低部门级ICT成本以及低效率的计划。

sentences.english: Each time, you would create a new pie chart, which is a little inefficient.
sentences.chinese: 每一次，您将创建一个新的扇形图，这有一点低效。

sentences.english: They resisted the introduction of low cost but inefficient method.
sentences.chinese: 他们拒绝了低消耗但也低效的方法的提议。

sentences.english: Eliminating the inefficient zone can improve mixing quality and efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 消除低效区可显著提高搅拌设备的作业质量和效率。

sentences.english: There are many causes for these problems from architecture to code inefficiencies.
sentences.chinese: 从架构到代码低效，很多原因导致了这些问题。

sentences.english: Low benefit forest refers to the stand with total low functions in economic system of forest ecology.
sentences.chinese: 低效林是指森林生态经济系统总体功能低下的林分。

sentences.english: Ineffective management caused/ resulted in poor profits.
sentences.chinese: 低效的管理导致了极差的利润。

sentences.english: Rote memorization is an inefficient way to learn.
sentences.chinese: 在学习上，死记硬背是一种低效的方法。

sentences.english: It would not be advisable to automate an inefficient process.
sentences.chinese: 对低效的流程进行自动化并不明智。

sentences.english: But it is inefficient when you are only interested in querying or updating part of a value, among other disadvantages.
sentences.chinese: 但是，你在查询或更新部分值时是很低效。

sentences.english: It would be inefficient to resize the collection with each add or remove.
sentences.chinese: 每次添加或移除元素后重新调整集合将非常低效。

sentences.english: In addition, this article has also considered Rongxian basin water used highly effective and the low efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 此外，本文还考虑了荣县流域用水的高效性和低效性。

sentences.english: It has the potential to shine light on pervasive inefficiencies and rampant corruption.
sentences.chinese: 这将有可能反映出遍布的低效能和猖獗的腐败现象。

sentences.english: The second cause is the slow and inefficient construction and improvement of the roads and streets.
sentences.chinese: 其次是缓慢而低效的建设和街道上的改善。

definition: to depend on/to be dependent on
